articles.title: Will Reeve, Christopher Reeve's son, gets married as 'GMA' stars celebrate 'perfect wedding' - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Christopher Reeve's son, 'Good Morning America' reporter Will Reeve, married Amanda Dubin in Miami over the weekend. The TV personality's ABC family, including Robin Roberts and Lara Spencer, celebrated the wedding.
articles.content:
Good Morning Americapersonality Will Reeve son of late Superman actor Christopher Reeve married his partner Amanda Dubin at a weekend ceremony attended by a wealth of the anchor's TV colleagues.
